First the oracles list has to contain a address that is the same as msg.sender.
Second the oracle must have an index (it has 3 in total) that is the same as the index provided.

registertrain(bytes32,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Register a future train for insuring. struct train { uint256 arrivalTime;   uint256 trainStatus; uint256 maxIndividualInsuredAmount;  uint256 maxTotalInsuredAmount; mapping(address => uint256) accountInsuredAmount; }
